subject: Ice Skating
lead_paragraph: Rachael Flatt won the title and led an American sweep in the women’s competition Saturday at the junior world figure skating championships in Sofia, Bulgaria. Caroline Zhang, who won the title last year, was a close second. The new United States senior champion, Mirai Nagasu, took the bronze medal.It was the second year in a row that American women have swept the medals at the junior worlds.
